comments:
Build ID: v20070601-0630

Steps To Reproduce:
1.download the rptdesign at http://www.eclipse.org/birt/phoenix/examples/solution/SalesInvoice.rptdesign
on page http://www.eclipse.org/birt/phoenix/examples/solution/
2.File > Open File... > select "SalesInvoice.rptdesign"
3.Error:
Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: Index: 2, Size: 1
Index: 2, Size: 1



More information:
Using birt-rcp-report-designer-2.2RC2.zip on Windows XP

from workspace\.metadata\.log
